## QueryFilter class

Manage filters applied to a query.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class QueryFilter 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(name, value)](./doofinder.queryfilter.add.md) |  | Add a value to filter by a field. |
|  [clear()](./doofinder.queryfilter.clear.md) |  | Clear all filters. |
|  [contains(name, value)](./doofinder.queryfilter.contains.md) |  | Check whether there's a filter for the provided name and it contains the provided value or not. |
|  [dump()](./doofinder.queryfilter.dump.md) |  | Dump all filters as an object. |
|  [equals(name, value)](./doofinder.queryfilter.equals.md) |  | Check whether there's a filter for the provided name and it's equal to the provided value or not. |
|  [get(name)](./doofinder.queryfilter.get.md) |  | Retrieve the value of a filter. |
|  [has(name)](./doofinder.queryfilter.has.md) |  | Check whether there's a filter for the provided name or not. |
|  [remove(name, value)](./doofinder.queryfilter.remove.md) |  | Remove a filter by a field. |
|  [set(name, value)](./doofinder.queryfilter.set.md) |  | Set the value of a filter. |
|  [setMany(data, replace)](./doofinder.queryfilter.setmany.md) |  | Set multiple filters at once. |
